title: Is Big Data a part of Cloud Computing? - Quora

response.answer_text: Yes you can say that big is part of computing if you are using cloud computing for your big data processing. But both are basically tow different things. Aaa: refers to big volume of data and how to process or analyse the data. Cloud computing; provides infrastructure or services on the internet. So you don't need any computer on your office/home to maintain any internet related business/stuff. Where it is related: you can use cloud computing to analyse your big data.

If you were either is a part of another, it would be false. Big data handles with all the data that is collected and processed in the world of a billion people. While Cloud computing is more like a service which helps you provide infrastructure and other computational needs to help run or store your data. Wither of them can supplement the other with their unique features, but they both are independent services and products from one another too.
